a.xlink:title: This class is a helper class, specifically for use as a button.
Widget for handling the input and manipulation of text.
This is the base class for container objects that automatically position it's children.
This is the base class for containers that have a render area and work area of different sizes...
This is the base class for interpretting widget values to page positions.
This is a simple widget where only one of it's selections can be selected at a time.
This is the base class for containers that stack their children one on top of the other...
This represents a nestable quad for an object in a GUI layout.
Basic class for all structures that get inserted into the rendering hierarchy.
This is the base class for any class that generates and publishes events to subscribers.
This is a base class for all classes that subscribe to events.
This is a simple widget for storing a bool value.
This is a button with additional data used to track the binding to a MenuEntry which can be serialize...
This is a container class for placing child objects on a 2 dimensional grid.
This is a container class for placing child objects in succession on a single axis.
A layout container that aligns it's children along a common X axis.
A layout container that aligns it's children along a common Y axis.
This is the scrollbar base class.
This is a simple widget for a numeric variable in a box.
This is a scrollbar class aligned on the X axis.
This is a scrollbar class aligned on the Y axis.
This class is an entry for a single window/widget in a menu.
